name: Leaf Hero
description:
It was a normal day until the Fire Spirits attacked... Dodge and weave and defeat your fiery foes as you fight and dodge from waves of enemies while being confined by a circle of bullets surrounding you and along the way gain powerups to help you survive and defeat your foes! Become the Leaf Hero little Leaf Bug!

Try and make it through all waves with the quickest time possible, try and beat your record!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Change border

Space - Pause game
